mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, TOPIC, LANGUAGE1, LANGUAGE2, COUNTRY, CITY, VISITED, REG_DATE, EDIT_DT, PROFILE, STAMP, PHOTO, USER_ID, LAT, LON, FLAG, LANGUAGE2_LEVEL, TIMEZONE, CASE WHEN STATUS='관리자' THEN 'ROLE_ADMIN' ELSE 'ROLE_USER' END STATUS FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} AND STATUS IN ('일반회원','관리자')
select d.uuid from photo_detail d, users u, photo p where d.photo_id = u.photo and d.photo_id = p.photo_id and u.user_id=#{user_id} and p.delete_yn = 'N'
